headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FARMAN, JACK, M.D.

snippet: FARMAN--Jack, M.D.,of Great Neck, NY. Beloved husband of the late Vilma. Devoted mother of Nicola Farman (Lance Wangel), Jessica Farman (Brian Dooley) and Peter and Gayle Farman. Adored grandfather of Sloan Wangel and Katie and Emma Farman. Memorial services will be held Friday, June 24th at 3pm at Sinai Chapels, Fresh Meadows, NY. For more information, visit: www.jewishfunerals.com. 1/3
